General.Name: Woory Industrial Holdings Co.Ltd
General.Description: Woory Industrial Holdings Co.,Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive air conditioning systems and electronic components in South Korea and internationally. The company offers HVAC, active air flap, local interconnect network, HLLD, swivel, bi-function shield, and charging door actuators; high and low-voltage positive temperature coefficient, coolant, and cathode oxygen depletion heaters; control heads; clutch coils; power module, resistor, current, parking assist system, and seat belt reminder sensors. It also provides coolant and expansion valves; and motor on drum electric parking brake (EPB) and cable puller EPB. The company was formerly known as Woory Industrial Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Woory Industrial Holdings Co.,Ltd. in May 2015. Woory Industrial Holdings Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Yongin-si, South Korea.
